response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's a valuable asset that has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Given its worth to you, I believe it's an excellent investment. I am offering this exceptional product to you for $12,000. This price reflects the quality, value, and potential benefits you stand to gain. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us. Looking forward to your response.", "product_price": 12000}
